mapper.select: select member_id, id from members where id = #{id} and password = #{password} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (email, member_name, birthday, password, nickname, mbti, gender, intro, phone_number, valued_count, score, email_verify_code, deleted) VALUES (#{email}, #{memberName}, #{birthday}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{mbti}, #{gender}, #{intro}, #{phoneNumber}, 0, 0, #{emailVerifyCode}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET member_name = #{memberName}, nickname = #{nickname}, mbti = #{mbti}, intro = #{intro}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber} WHERE email = #{email}
